      • loadGameBoard

        public void loadGameBoard(java.lang.String[][] gameBoardFromFile)
        takes in a string array of the game board and load it on the gameboard as enum values (for load game)
        Parameters:
        gameBoardFromFile - - a string array of game board that correspond with values of game board - these values based on a file

      • returnBoard

        public void returnBoard(int boardType)
        Prints a formatted version of the board.
        Parameters:
        boardType - Int that will specify whether the game shall display the gameBoard or guessBoard

      • addShip

        public void addShip(int ID,
                    int len,
                    char orient,
                    int ro,
                    int col)
        Adds ship board base on its coordinates generated in the ship class. Will be called after all verification and checks are passed
        Parameters:
        len - length of the ship
        ID - a assigned ID that is used to identify each ship through its index in the ship array
        orient - character indicating the orientation of the ship
        ro - row, most top coordinate
        col - column, most left coordinate

      • aShipSunken

        public boolean aShipSunken(int rowAttacked,
                           int columnAttacked)
        check if a ship has sunken base on the position being attacked
        Parameters:
        rowAttacked - y coordinate of position attacked
        columnAttacked - x coordinate of position attacked
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether a ship has been sunken

      • checkAllShipSunken

        public boolean checkAllShipSunken()
        check the values of whether each ship is sunken in the ship array
        Returns:
        true if a ships are sunken
